languages.text: "Вам не нравится? Досадно!" {n}Джай расстроенно хмурится.{/n} "Пойдем, Сирокко. Ты будешь жить в моих покоях. Постарайся никого там не съесть — ковры очень дорогие!"

"You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"
languages.original_text: "Вам не нравится? Досадно!" {n}Джай расстроенно хмурится.{/n} "Пойдем, Сирокко. Ты будешь жить в моих покоях. Постарайся никого там не съесть — ковры очень дорогие!"

traits.locale_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你不喜欢她吗？这太遗憾了。”{n}婕伊失望地皱起了眉头。{/n}“那你就住在我的房间里吧，西罗科。尽量别吃人，会把房间弄脏的。房间里的地毯可贵得吓人！”
languages.original_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"

traits.locale_text: “你不喜欢她吗？这太遗憾了。”{n}婕伊失望地皱起了眉头。{/n}“那你就住在我的房间里吧，西罗科。尽量别吃人，会把房间弄脏的。房间里的地毯可贵得吓人！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女が嫌いなの？残念だね」{n}ジェイは落胆して顔をしかめる。 {/n}「おいで、シロッコ。あたしの宿舎に住みましょう。誰も食べないようにしなさい。汚れるし、カーペットはひどく高価だからね！」
languages.original_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼女が嫌いなの？残念だね」{n}ジェイは落胆して顔をしかめる。 {/n}「おいで、シロッコ。あたしの宿舎に住みましょう。誰も食べないようにしなさい。汚れるし、カーペットはひどく高価だからね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿No le gusta? Pues es una pena». {n}Jae frunce el ceño, decepcionada.{/n} «Vamos, Sirocco. Vivirás en mis aposentos. Intenta no comerte a nadie: manchas mucho ¡y las alfombras son muy caras!».
languages.original_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"

traits.locale_text: «¿No le gusta? Pues es una pena». {n}Jae frunce el ceño, decepcionada.{/n} «Vamos, Sirocco. Vivirás en mis aposentos. Intenta no comerte a nadie: manchas mucho ¡y las alfombras son muy caras!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Elle ne vous plaît pas ? C'est bien dommage, {n}dit Jae en se renfrognant, visiblement déçue.{/n} Viens, Sirocco. Tu vas t'installer dans mes quartiers. Essaie de ne manger personne... Ce serait horriblement salissant, et mes tapis coûtent très cher ! »
languages.original_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"

traits.locale_text: « Elle ne vous plaît pas ? C'est bien dommage, {n}dit Jae en se renfrognant, visiblement déçue.{/n} Viens, Sirocco. Tu vas t'installer dans mes quartiers. Essaie de ne manger personne... Ce serait horriblement salissant, et mes tapis coûtent très cher ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr mögt sie nicht? Wie schade." {n}Jae runzelt enttäuscht die Stirn.{/n} "Los, Sirocco. Du wirst in meinem Quartier wohnen. Friss niemanden auf – das hinterlässt nur eine Sauerei und die Teppiche sind einfach zu teuer dafür!"
languages.original_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mögt sie nicht? Wie schade." {n}Jae runzelt enttäuscht die Stirn.{/n} "Los, Sirocco. Du wirst in meinem Quartier wohnen. Friss niemanden auf – das hinterlässt nur eine Sauerei und die Teppiche sind einfach zu teuer dafür!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sevmedin mi? Çok yazık." {n}Jae, hayal kırıklığıyla kaş çatıyor.{/n} "Gel Sirocco. Benim odamda yaşayacaksın. Kimseyi yememeye çalış. Etraf batmasın, halılarım inanılmaz pahalı!"
languages.original_text: "You don't like her? That's a shame." {n}Jae frowns in disappointment.{/n} "Come, Sirocco. You will live in my quarters. Try not to eat anyone — you'll make a mess, and the carpets are terribly expensive!"

traits.locale_text: "Sevmedin mi onu? Çok yazık." {n}Jae hayal kırıklığıyla kaş çatıyor.{/n} "Gel Sirocco. Benim odamda yaşayacaksın. Kimseyi yememeye çalış yoksa etraf batar ve halılar inanılmaz pahalı!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
